mapper.select:
SELECT m.id,m.menu_name,m.menu_status,m.is_del,m.menu_action,m.is_child_node,m.create_time,m.update_time,m.menu_order,m.menu_remarks,m.creator,m.updator,u.real_name AS creatorName,ui.real_name AS updatorName FROM sys_menu_info m LEFT JOIN sys_user_info u ON m.creator=u.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_info ui ON m.updator=ui.id WHERE m.is_del=0 and m.pid is null
and m.menu_name LIKE '%${menuName}%'
and m.menu_status = #{menuStatus}
ORDER BY m.menu_order ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu_info(menu_name, menu_action, is_child_node, create_time, menu_order, menu_remarks, creator, pid) VALUES (#{menuName}, #{menuAction}, #{isChildNode}, #{createTime}, #{menuOrder}, #{menuRemarks}, #{creator}, #{pid})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu_info SET menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_action = #{menuAction}, menu_order = #{menuOrder}, menu_remarks = #{menuRemarks}, update_time = #{updateTime}, updator = #{updator} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.menu_name, m.menu_action, m.is_child_node FROM sys_menu_info m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu r ON m.id = r.menu_id AND r.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.role_id = ur.role_id and ur.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_user_info u ON ur.user_id = u.id AND u.is_del = 0 WHERE m.is_del = 0 AND m.menu_status = 0 AND u.user_name = #{userName} AND m.pid IS NULL ORDER BY m.menu_order ASC
